# Surefoot (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 216

*You speak a few words and motion toward your feet, which begin to glow with a green hue.*

Your steps are sure and true, even on the narrowest ledges. You gain a +10 competence bonus on [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] and [[Climb (Skill)|Climb]] (v3.5 Balance, Jump, and Tumble) checks. In addition, you do not lose your Dexterity bonus to AC when balancing or climbing.
